description.narrative: Joint UNDP-DPPA Programme on building national capacities for conflict prevention deploys Peace and Development Advisors (PDAs) in fragile countries and supports Resident Coordinators (RCs) and UNCTs.

participating-org.narrative: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC

sector.narrative: Build resilience to shocks and crisis

provider-org.narrative: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: # of international Peace and Development Advisors (PDAs) deployed # of national Peace and Development Advisers deployed % of JP countries where PDA supported developing or improving national policies and strategies for conflict prevention % of JP countries where PDA supported UNCT or its members programming for conflict prevention

comment.narrative: 43 international Peace and Development Advisors (PDAs) deployed6 6 national Peace and Development Advisers deployed 62% of JP countries where PDA supported developing or improving national policies and strategies for conflict prevention 95% of JP countries where PDA supported UNCT or its members programming for conflict prevention
